messages.subject: general
messages.msgSnippet: 1.)  All are welcome to come to Michigan to visit our family.  We have a teeny house, but bring sleeping bags - we might get lucky enough to borrow the kinfolk
messages.messageBody:
1.) All are welcome to come to Michigan to visit our family. We have a teeny house, but bring sleeping bags - we might get lucky enough to borrow the kinfolk cottage on Lake Huron if you come in warmer weather. We love to have company, but allergy folks be prepared; we have 3 cats, 2 dogs (all rescuees).

2.) I love all the family photos, I really do. It is so nice to finally have faces to put with the names.

3.) I am 33, had grey hair since 13 - and if my normal hair color was anything but bleck brown I would leave nature to take its course. However, I do enjoy changing the color of my hair every now and then. As my husbands grandmother says, "ya have to paint an old barn once in a while".

Back to your regular scheduled postings.

sistakammi


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
